#summary What's the Crypt class?
#labels Documentation

The Crypt class provides an easy and secure way to encrypt and decrypt data using the [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cryptography#Symmetric-key_cryptography Symmetric Cryptography] method, that is a low cost algorithm that encrypt data based on the shared keys conecpt.
